classic.name: Classic
classic.desc: One extension per natural lash for a clean, natural look.

2d3d.name: 2D / 3D
2d3d.desc: Small fans for a fuller line while keeping it lightweight.

wetEffect.name: Wet effect
wetEffect.desc: Glossy, spiky styling with thin closed fans.

4d5d.name: 4D–5D
4d5d.desc: Volume fans for dramatic density and depth.

volume.name: Volume
volume.desc: Custom mix of volumes tailored to your eye shape.
